elements.text: You are at an event with people you do not know well. You decide to join some people who are sitting on a couch and talking. When you try to enter the conversation, the people on the couch continue talking to each other because they were probably...

elements.name: Conversing at a party_Social Situations_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
